title_en: When's it due ?
Tell me a bit abort yourself.
When's this rain gonna let up?
You're a real pain in the neck ,you know ?
It's such a waste of time .
Wow. What a big boy !
You sound horrible !
Come on, spit it out.
How did you enjoy your stay ,Robinson?
title_zh: Robinson 先生，您在这里住的怎么样?

title_en: You made these from scrach?
You know, I'd love to, but I can't.
title_zh: 我很想去，但实在没办法。

title_en: I highly recommemd it.
Go right ahead .
No way! Get out of here!
It's kind of hit-or-miss.
I have bags under my eyes, don't I ?
Nah, she's way out of my league.
title_zh: 得了吧，我哪配得上人家呀。

title_en: He just blew me off.
title_zh: 他就这么把我给打发了。

title_en: I'd like to cancel my membership.
OK, well, I'll let you go.
The pace here is a lot slower.
title_zh: 这里的生活节奏可真是慢多了。

title_en: I've got goose bumps.
You have my word.
